service.name: Basket Service
service.summary: CRUD based API to handle Basket interactions for users of the shopping website.

publishes.name: AddedItemToCart
publishes.summary: Holds information about what the user added to their shopping cart.

publishes.name: OrderRequested
publishes.summary: Holds information about the customers order.

publishes.name: RemovedItemFromCart
publishes.summary: Holds information about what the user removed from their cart.

markdown.content:
Simple API that handles interactions between users and their baskets. Use this service to add, remove and query the status of a users basket.

This service will also generate Async events for downstream services.

<NodeGraph />
